name: clustalw
description: Multiple alignment of nucleic acid and protein sequences.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependent_to.name: tcoffee
dependent_to.description: T-Coffee is a multiple sequence alignment program.

dependent_to.name: guidance
dependent_to.description:
Guidance: Accurate detection of unreliable alignment regions accounting
for the uncertainty of multiple parameters.
